item.title: SQLTap and CKAN
item.description: Are you a CKAN developer? Have you had a trip or fall at work involving a slow running sql query that wasn’t your fault? Do you terribly miss the django debug toolbar, pyramid debugtoolbar, flask debugtoolbar or similar? Well you’re basically screwed, but to help alleviate the pain I made a tiny ckan extension that integrates the SQLTap middleware with ckan, once you’ve added ‘sqltap’ to your list of plugins in your development init you’ll find the sqltap interface at
